snippet: The British architect Norman Foster has resigned from a proposed expansion of the Pushkin Museum of Fine Arts in Moscow.
abstract: British architect Norman Foster resigns from proposed expansion of Pushkin Museum of Fine Arts in Moscow, saying that his firm, Foster & Partners, has been left out of project developments.
lead_paragraph: The British architect Norman Foster has resigned from a proposed expansion of the Pushkin Museum of Fine Arts in Moscow.

headline.print_headline: Project in Moscow Loses Norman Foster
headline.main: Project in Moscow Loses Norman Foster
